Html:
Hi,

Im looking at the 4412 GDirections code and I wonder if it's possible to get the html response with the directions in specific language (ex.greek)

Thank you

I made a google map 'get directions' greek language and got the link:

http://maps.google.com/maps?f=d&source=s_d&saddr=%CF%86%CE%B9%CE%BB%CE%BF%CF%80%CE%BF%CE%B9%CE%BC%CE%B5%CE%BD%CE%BF%CF%83+8,+%CE%B7%CE%BB%CE%B9%CE%BF%CF%85%CF%80%CE%BF%CE%BB%CE%B7&daddr=%CE%B3%CE%BF%CF%85%CE%BD%CE%B1%CF%81%CE%B7+47,+%CE%B3%CE%BB%CF%85%CF%86%CE%B1%CE%B4%CE%B1&hl=de&geocode=FarmQgIdVXVqASlZ4aB2hb2hFDFnKhzRGsTuOg%3BFV8mQgId1JBqASlFP7BcHr6hFDFCvD2WJ_v-eQ&mra=ls&sll=37.93885,23.754072&sspn=0.012049,0.032938&g=%CF%86%CE%B9%CE%BB%CE%BF%CF%80%CE%BF%CE%B9%CE%BC%CE%B5%CE%BD%CE%BF%CF%83+8,+%CE%B7%CE%BB%CE%B9%CE%BF%CF%85%CF%80%CE%BF%CE%BB%CE%B7&ie=UTF8&z=13

changing hl=el to hl=de I got the route directions in german. I will work on this, and post my results.
According to this Im pointing at the wrigth thing but still no result

Finally,

the sample 3561 in the Etc folder, has a function called 'MakeRouteAndDirectionsKmlUrl' having a parameter 'language' for building the Http request.

Hope, I helped.
